title: The surprising economics of digital lending
description: Long gone are the days of hauling sixty books home from the local library. With eBooks, the worlds of Fahrenheit 451 to Harry Potter are at your fingertips with just a tap. But what's the price behind the click?
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
